description: Mina Li is an undergraduate at UC Berkeley, graduating in May 2015 with a B.A. in Computer Science. She joined the Clotho team in January 2014, and her primary work has been in the development of Python functions that enable the user to query from a variety of databases, and to manipulate and convert between various representations of data within Clotho.
name: Mina Li
title: Student Research Assistant (Developer)
